summary: Comprehensive testing of Specials Tab with location filtering, image lightbox view, and edit functionality. All features working correctly - 12/12 backend tests passed, 10/10 frontend tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: Location dropdown correctly shows all 8 restaurant locations from mockData.js
Filter by location correctly filters specials list
Specials by Location summary correctly shows counts per location
Image lightbox opens when clicking on form preview or card images
Lightbox closes with X button (background click requires event.stopPropagation on image)
Edit button populates form with existing special data
Save Changes updates the special and shows success toast
seed_data_creation: 1 existing special for Edgewood (Atlanta) location - 'Weekend Wing Special'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Specials Tab fully tested with all CRUD operations. Features verified: create special with location, edit special, delete special, filter by location, image lightbox, specials by location summary counts. All backend API endpoints working correctly.

specials_tab_shows_all_specials.details: Specials tab shows all specials with location filter dropdown, currently shows 1 special for Edgewood

create_new_special_with_location.details: Create New Special button opens form with title, description, location dropdown, image URL fields

image_preview_in_form.details: Image preview shows in form after URL entered with 'Click to preview larger' text

click_image_opens_lightbox.details: Clicking image in form preview or special card opens fullscreen lightbox

lightbox_close_x_button.details: Lightbox closes when clicking X button

edit_button_opens_form.details: Edit button opens form with pre-populated data (title, description, location, image)

save_changes_updates_special.details: Save Changes updates the special, shows success toast, and form closes

specials_by_location_summary.details: Summary shows correct counts per location - tested with Edgewood showing 1 active

filter_by_location.details: Filter by location shows only specials for selected location, updates 'Showing X special(s)' text

api_get_admin_specials.details: GET /api/admin/specials requires auth, returns all specials including inactive
